TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi XPathMessageContext extends System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext

summary.span: 定义利用 SOAP 文档计算 XPath 表达式时经常要使用的多个 XPath 函数和命名空间映射。

span.span: Defines several XPath functions and namespace mappings commonly used when evaluating XPath expressions against SOAP documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XPath 引擎具有完全 XPath 上下文支持并使用.NET Framework 的类中相同的方式执行若要实现此支持。The XPath engine has full XPath context support and uses the .NET Framework's class in the same way that does to implement this support. 是一个抽象类，允许开发人员实现自定义 XPath 函数库，并声明 XPath 变量。 is an abstract class that allows developers to implement custom XPath function libraries and declare XPath variables. 是，因此还包含命名空间前缀映射。 is an and thus also contains the namespace prefix mappings. 筛选器引擎可以实现名称为 的 。The filter engine implements an named . 不但可以定义 Xpath 表达式中使用的自定义函数，还可声明多个常用的命名空间前缀映射。 defines custom functions that can be used in XPath expressions and it declares several common namespace prefix mappings. 下表列出由定义的自定义函数，可以使用 XPath 表达式中。The following table lists the custom functions defined by that can be used in XPath expressions. |XPath 函数XPath Function|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |正文body|返回的 SOAP 正文节点，而不考虑 SOAP 版本 (1.1。Returns the SOAP Body node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1. 或 1.2）。or 1.2).| |标题header|返回的 SOAP 标头节点，而不考虑 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。Returns the SOAP Header node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |correlation-datacorrelation-data|采用一个输入的字符串并返回关联的相关消息属性的值。Takes an input string and returns the value of the associated correlation message property. wsc instanceId 是保留的字符串用于基于上下文的相关。'wsc-instanceId' is a reserved string used for context-based correlation.| |messageIdmessageId|返回 Ws-addressing MessageID 标头的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing MessageID header.| |relatesTorelatesTo|返回 Ws-addressing RelatesTo 标头，无论何种版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing RelatesTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |replyToreplyTo|返回 Ws-addressing ReplyTo 标头，无论何种版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing ReplyTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |从from|返回 Ws-addressing 从标头的值，无论何种版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0）。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing From header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |faultTofaultTo|返回 Ws-addressing FaultTo 标头，无论何种版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing FaultTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |更改为to|返回的值的 Ws-addressing 中的 To 标头 （如果存在），否则则返回 Anonymous。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing To header if present, else it returns Anonymous.| |actionaction|返回 Ws-addressing Action 标头的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing Action header.| |soap-urisoap-uri|返回的 SOAP 命名空间 uri。Returns the SOAP namespace uri.| |headers-with-actorheaders-with-actor|采用 SOAP Actor uri 并返回包含该 actor，无论何种 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本的所有标头。Takes a SOAP Actor uri and returns all headers that contain that actor, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |Actoractor|返回第一个子节点，而不考虑 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本的 SOAP Actor uri。Returns the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |is-mandatoryis-mandatory|返回第一个子节点是必需的而不考虑 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。Returns whether or not the first child node is mandatory, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |is-actor-nextis-actor-next|返回第一个子节点的 SOAP Actor uri 假定任何 SOAP 版本 （1.1 或 1.2） 的下一步角色。Returns whether or not the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node assumes the Next role, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |is-actor-ultimate-receiveris-actor-ultimate-receiver|返回第一个子节点的 SOAP Actor uri 假定 UltimateReceiver 角色，无论何种 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。Returns whether or not the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node assumes the UltimateReceiver role, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |日期时间date-time|采用一个输入的日期字符串并返回转换为双精度的值。Takes an input date string and returns the value converted to a double.| |durationduration|接受输入的 timespan 字符串并返回值作为总天数。Takes an input timespan string and returns the value as a total number of days.| |utc-nowutc-now|返回的值。Returns the value of .| 下表列出了由声明的默认命名空间和命名空间前缀。The following table lists the default namespaces and namespace prefixes that are declared by . |前缀Prefix|命名空间Namespace| |------------|---------------| |s11s11|http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope| |s12s12|http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope| |wsaAugust2004wsaAugust2004|http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing| |wsa10wsa10|http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing| |smsm|http://schemas.microsoft.com/serviceModel/2004/05/xpathfunctions| |tempuritempuri|http://tempuri.org| |serser|http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization|

param.span: 内部用于存储字符串的 类。

span.span: A class used internally to store strings.

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括此类、 和 在内的多个类在内部使用 类来存储属性和元素名称。Several classes including this one, , and use the class internally to store attribute and element names. 当 XML 文档中多次出现某个元素名或属性名时，该名称在 中只存储一次。When an element or attribute name occurs multiple times in an XML document, it is stored only once in the . 这些名称存储为公共语言运行时 (CLR) 对象类型。The names are stored as common language runtime (CLR) object types. 这使您能够对这些字符串进行对象比较，而不是开销更大的字符串比较。This enables you to do object comparisons on these strings rather than a more expensive string comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int CompareDocument (string baseUri, string nextBaseUri);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 CompareDocument(string baseUri, string nextBaseUri) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CompareDocument (baseUri As String, nextBaseUri As String) As Integer
public: override int CompareDocument(System::String ^ baseUri, System::String ^ nextBaseUri);

param.name: baseUri
param.span: 要比较的第一个文档的基 URI。

span.span: The base URI of the first document to compare.

param.name: nextBaseUri
param.span: 要比较的第二个文档的基 URI。

span.span: The base URI of the second document to compare.

summary.span: 根据 XSLT 处理器加载文档的顺序对两个文档的基统一资源标识符 (URI) 进行比较。

span.span: Compares the base Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) of two documents based upon the order the documents were loaded by the XSLT processor.
Always returns 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应在派生的类中重写，然后才可以使用。This property should be overridden in a derived class in order to be used.

span.span: Evaluates whether to preserve white space nodes or strip them for the given context.
Always returns .

public: override System::Xml::Xsl::IXsltContextFunction ^ ResolveFunction(System::String ^ prefix, System::String ^ name, cli::array <System::Xml::XPath::XPathResultType> ^ argTypes);

param.name: prefix
param.span: 在 XPath 表达式中显示的函数的前缀。

span.span: The prefix of the function as it appears in the XPath expression.
The name of the function.

param.name: argTypes
param.span: 正在被解析的函数的自变量类型的数组。

span.span: An array of argument types for the function being resolved.

param.span: 这样您就可以在同名称的方法（例如，重载方法）中进行选择。

span.span: This allows you to select between methods with the same name (for example, overloaded methods).

summary.span: 解析函数引用并返回表示该函数的 [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm)。

span.span: Resolves a function reference and returns an [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm) that represents the function.
An [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm) that represents the function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm)在执行时用于计算函数。The [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm) is used at execution time to evaluate the function.
